title: Heavenly Wife - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life   Xuanhuan   Yaoi
tags: Bickering Couple   Black Belly   Cannibalism   Clingy Lover   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Delusions   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dragons   Early Romance   Handsome Male Lead   Heavenly Tribulation   Immortals   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Mpreg   Multiple Realms   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Persistent Love Interests   Pets   Phoenixes   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests
author: Kun Cheng Xiong Mao   Trapped into a panda   困成熊猫
description:
Feng Yang, a celestial phoenix whose spiritual roots were cut off by his biological father, plunged into the human world, where he opened the first psychological clinic on a street every weekend, in the hopes of gathering merits by rescuing humankind and regaining the chance of ascension.

The smooth sailing clinic suddenly welcomed a delusional patient…

Feng Yang: How can I help you?

Ban Yu: I can sense my dragon qi coming from your body! At a single glance, I know that you’re my fiancée!

Feng Yang: …Get lost!>
